Experiment Method.Assay Method: siRNA knockdown/overexpression combined with Western blot and cell viability assay

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased kinase activity and reduced cell viability observed for the c.1190A>G variant.
Increased kinase activity and reduced cell viability observed for the c.1645G>C variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels within 10-20% of wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels exceeding 50% increase or decrease compared to wild-type controls.
